sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="showFormButton" class=" btn" :class="btnClass">Show
        form</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "btnToggler",
    data() {
        return {
            showForm: false,
            btnClass: 'btn-success'
        }
    },
    methods: {
        showFormButton() {
            this.showForm = !this.showForm
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style></style>
